caption.p: Global recorded locations and model-predicted distribution probability of H. longicornis. (A) Each occurrence record of H. longicornis was geo-referenced and linked to the digital world map. The recording time of the H. longicornis presence was marked by colour gradients from red to green. (B) The potential geographic range of H. longicornis was predicted and mapped by using a maximum entropy method based on eco-geographical and climatic variables.
